properties.entry: SELECT A.PLAYER_ID , A.PLAY_TIME , A.PLAYER_LEVEL , A.PLAYER_EXP , A.PLAYER_GOLD , A.PLAYER_MAX_HP , A.PLAYER_SP , A.PLAYER_DP , B.USER_BL_YN FROM PLAYER_INFO A JOIN PLAYER B ON(A.PLAYER_ID = B.USER_ID) WHERE B.USER_BL_YN = 'Y'
UPDATE PLAYER_INFO A SET A.PLAY_TIME = ? , A.PLAYER_LEVEL = ? , A.PLAYER_EXP = ? , A.PLAYER_GOLD = ? , A.PLAYER_HP = ? , A.PLAYER_SP = ? , A.PLAYER_DP = ? WHERE PLAYER_ID = ?;
UPDATE PLAYER B SET USER_BL_YN = ? WHERE USER_ID = ?;
